Fortran to C

f2c

Fortran to C converter.

Syntax

f2c(src, dest)
r = f2c(src, dest)
[r, msg] = f2c(src, dest)

Input argument

src

a string: fortran source file.

dest

a string: destination directory.

Output argument

r

a logical: true if success.

msg

a string: error message or ''.

Description

f2c converts fortran 66, and fortran 77 files to C.

Example

f2c([modulepath(nelsonroot(),'f2c','root'), '/tests/dgemm.f'], tempdir());
fileread([tempdir(), 'dgemm.c'])

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
